description: The Options Clearing Corporation (OCC) is the world's largest equity derivatives clearing organization. Founded in 1973, OCC is dedicated to promoting stability and market integrity by delivering clearing and settlement services for options, futures and securities lending transactions. As a Systemically Important Financial Market Utility (SIFMU), OCC operates under the jurisdiction of the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC), the U.S. Commodity Futures Trading Commission (CFTC), and the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System. OCC has more than 100 clearing members and provides central counterparty (CCP) clearing and settlement services to 20 exchanges and trading platforms. More information about OCC is available at www.theocc.com.
name: OCC

similar_companies.name: Office of the Comptroller of the Currency

This Veterans Day, we recognize and express gratitude to all veterans and members of the military for your service, and to all your families for their support.

There's no one size fits all approach to managing every risk organizations face, but there are strategic ways to prioritize the most likely and impactful potential risks across a variety of applications. In his recent article, our colleague Michael Leibrock, Managing Director of Credit Risk Management, dives into how a #RiskManagement framework can help organizations focus on the biggest threats facing their business. Read it here: https://bit.ly/48BOfHS
#riskassessment #systemicrisk

OCC’s Megan Malone Cohen and Pat Hickey are heading to #SIFMAMarketStructure (Nov. 6-7)!

They'll discuss the evolving landscape of market structure and its impact on market participants. Pat will moderate a panel exploring the effects of volume growth and competition on market resiliency, while Megan will join industry peers to share insights on regulatory and clearing updates.

Details are here: https://lnkd.in/e-puzSvf 

#Options #MarketStructure #Resiliency

Yesterday, the Women in Listed Derivatives (WILD) Board, members, and supporters had an amazing time at OCC for the #TakeWILDtoWork series. A special thanks to our incredible panelists Lindsay (Burke) Baus, Tricia Perl, CMP, Summer Pistorius, Cheryl Martin, and Andrea Lewis Bergquist for sharing their leadership journeys, insights on working at #OCC, industry trends, and experiences as women rising in their careers.  #WomenInListedDerivatives #WILD #OTC #derivatives #trading #WomenInFinance #Leadership #Networking #WomenEmpowerment #CareerGrowth #FinanceIndustry #WomenInBusiness #ChicagoNetworking

Maura Durkin Amy Norden, CSM, CSPO Lisa Campbell Tricia Perl, CMP Carrie Leonard Geeta Chakravorty Nahiomy Alvarez Sheetal Naukudkar Sarah McCarron Nick Dennes Taotao Xing, CFA CMT

Dallas colleagues recently volunteered at Tom C. Gooch Elementary on behalf of our charity partner, United to Learn. Thanks to all volunteers for helping revitalize the outdoor courtyard space for students, assemble staff appreciation goodie bags, and organize textbooks! OCC donated $25 per hour of Volunteer Time Off used for a total of $2,200 as part of our "Dollars for Doers" program. Through our partnership, OCC is working to close opportunity gaps, accelerate student achievement, and advance educational equity in Dallas ISD schools. #WeAreOCC

Last week, OCC colleagues gathered for sOCCials in Chicago and Dallas in celebration of National Coming Out Day. They enjoyed food, drinks, and a celebration of LGBTQ+ visibility. We’re proud to celebrate National Coming Out Day and show support for individuals to be their authentic selves at work each day. #WeAreOCC #lgbtq #lgbtqequality

Read OCC's comments on the Financial Data Transparency Act Joint Data Standards Rulemaking Proposal, which aims to establish data standards to promote interoperability of financial regulatory data across multiple government agencies. https://lnkd.in/gHVjTRFG
